attributes.action: stop holiday companies charging extra just to seat families together!
attributes.additional_details: The company I'm flying with despite being an all inclusive holiday want an extra £75 just to seat us together as a family when my son turns 12 next year unless we pay the extortion then he will be made to sit anywhere there is a seat available so not with his parents or sister.
attributes.background: I don't care where I sit on a plane but I do want to sit with my husband and kids! The holiday companies charge for this! It's not an "upgrade" to sit with your children! Holiday companies need tighter regulation on what they charge for and what is classed as an upgrade
